ground_truth: The glow of the dawn sky and the lights of three approaching helicopters illuminate the scene as Helen rushes indoors, shocked. She kisses him on the cheek and rushes off, joining Klaatu and Jacob as they leave the house and run for the car through the rain. They abandon the car and run into the dense surrounding woodland, with Klaatu leading the way, Helen struggling to keep up while holding Jacob's hand. They run through the woods as fast as they can as the helicopters thunder overhead. Jacob breaks away from Helen's grasp, and a soldier drops down a rope to snatch Helen. As the two remaining helicopters hover above, Klaatu strides past the stunned Jacob into a clearing and attracts the targeting lasers to the palms of his hands. As they fire, Klaatu reverses the energy flow, causing the pilots to clutch their helmets in agony as the helicopters go out of control, smash into each other, and plunge to the ground, erupting in a huge fireball. Jacob turns and runs back into the woods, with Klaatu following at a leisurely pace. The boy comes to a narrow wooden bridge over a river and, terrified, steps onto the wet planks. As he backs away from the advancing alien, a rocking board breaks under him, but Klaatu reaches out and stops him from falling. Frowning, Klaatu studies Jacob, who looks hopefully up at him. They stare at one another, and then Klaatu strides off, with Jacob hesitating but then following him. Meanwhile, an operative in a protective suit enters the chamber with GORT to repair the drill mechanism, as the agent and ops room staff watch through the window. The chipped drill bit is removed and replaced with a new one. Deep in the minute cracks of the damaged drill, tiny black bugs flutter and multiply by dividing in two. Klaatu glances at the operative, who tightens up the new drill bit and is about to leave when he notices the old drill bit being eaten away. He drops it and hurriedly makes to leave the chamber, but his suit, air canister, and body are being eaten away. The massive steel bands holding GORT are also being eaten, and as the agent watches, the window glass is attacked. A massive jet of flame roars up the chamber, and the operations room staff squint in the intense glare. Flames and smoke clear, but GORT remains, his eyes still glowing. The agent stares in fear as GORT raises his massive hands to show he's free and dissolves into a cloud of bugs filling the flash chamber. The agent bolts for the door, but his pass won't work, while the officer in charge watches grimly as the swirling cloud attacks the windows.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: The radiance of the dawn sky and the illuminations of three incoming helicopters brighten the spectacle as Helen rushes indoors, stunned. She kisses him on the face and rushes off, joining Klaatu and Jacob as they exit the dwelling and dash for the vehicle through the rain. They forsake the auto and sprint into the dense encircling forest, with Klaatu leading the course, Helen striving to keep up while clutching Jacob's hand. They dash through the thicket as swiftly as they can as the helicopters roar overhead. Jacob breaks away from Helen's grip, and a trooper descends a cord to seize Helen. As the two remaining helicopters hover above, Klaatu strides past the astonished Jacob into a glade and attracts the targeting beams to the palms of his hands. As they discharge, Klaatu reverses the energy flow, causing the aviators to grasp their helmets in torment as the helicopters lose control, collide with each other, and plummet to the earth, erupting in an enormous explosion. Jacob turns and retreats into the forest, with Klaatu trailing at a leisurely pace. The boy arrives at a narrow wooden bridge over a river and, frightened, steps onto the damp planks. As he retreats from the advancing extraterrestrial, a swaying board breaks beneath him, but Klaatu extends his arm and prevents him from falling. Scowling, Klaatu examines Jacob, who gazes hopefully up at him. They gaze at one another, and then Klaatu strides off, with Jacob pausing but then following him. Meanwhile, an operative in a protective suit enters the chamber with GORT to mend the drill mechanism, as the agent and operations room personnel observe through the window. The chipped drill bit is detached and replaced with a new one. Deep in the minuscule cracks of the damaged drill, tiny black insects flutter and proliferate by splitting in two. Klaatu glances at the operative, who secures the new drill bit and is about to depart when he notices the old drill bit being consumed. He drops it and hastily attempts to exit the chamber, but his suit, air canister, and body are being consumed. The massive steel bands securing GORT are also being consumed, and as the agent observes, the window glass is assaulted. A massive jet of flame roars up the chamber, and the operations room personnel squint in the intense glare. Flames and smoke clear, but GORT remains, his eyes still glowing. The agent stares in dread as GORT raises his massive hands to show he's free and dissolves into a cloud of insects filling the flash chamber. The agent bolts for the door, but his pass won't function, while the officer in charge watches grimly as the swirling cloud assaults the windows.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: The glow of the dawn sky and the lights of three approaching helicopters are used to illuminate the scene as indoors, Helen is rushed by shock. He is kissed on the cheek by her, and she rushes off, joining Klaatu and Jacob as the house is left by them and the car is run for through the rain. The car is abandoned by them, and the dense surrounding woodland is run into, with the way being led by Klaatu, and Helen struggling to keep up while Jacob's hand is held by her. Through the woods, they are run as fast as they can as the helicopters are thundered overhead. Helen's grasp is broken away from by Jacob, and a soldier snatches Helen by dropping down a rope. Above, the two remaining helicopters are hovered, Klaatu striding past the stunned Jacob into a clearing and attracting the targeting lasers to the palms of his hands. As they fire, he reverses the energy flow, causing the pilots to clutch their helmets in agony as the helicopters are sent out of control, smashed into each other, and plunged to the ground, erupting in a huge fireball. Back into the woods, Jacob turns and runs, with a leisurely pace followed by Klaatu. The boy comes to a narrow wooden bridge over a river and, terrified, steps onto the wet planks. He is backed away from by the advancing alien, but as a rocking board breaks under him, Klaatu reaches out and stops him. Frowning, Jacob is studied by Klaatu, who hopes to be looked at by him. One another is stared at by them, and Klaatu strides off, with his following hesitated but then done by Jacob. Meanwhile, a protective suit is worn by an operative entering the chamber with GORT to repair the drill mechanism, as the agent and ops room staff watch through the window. The chipped drill bit is removed and replaced with a new one. Deep in the minute cracks of the damaged drill, tiny black bugs are fluttered and multiplied by dividing in two. The operative is glanced at by Klaatu, who tightens up the new drill bit and is about to leave when he notices the old drill bit being eaten away. It is dropped by him, and the chamber is hurriedly made to leave, but his suit, air canister, and body are being eaten away. The massive steel bands holding GORT are also being eaten, and as the agent watches, the window glass is attacked. Up the chamber, a massive jet of flame is roared, and the operations room staff squints in the intense glare. Flames and smoke clear, but GORT remains, his eyes still glowing. In fear, the agent stares as his massive hands are raised by GORT to show he's free, and into a cloud of bugs filling the flash chamber, he is dissolved. For the door, the agent bolts, but his pass won't work, while the officer in charge watches grimly as the swirling cloud attacks the windows.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: As dawn breaks, the glow of the sky and helicopter lights illuminate the scene as Helen rushes indoors, shocked. She kisses him and hurries off with Klaatu and Jacob, running through the rain to the car. They abandon it and dash into the dense woods, Klaatu leading, Helen struggling with Jacob. Helicopters thunder overhead as Jacob breaks free, and a soldier grabs Helen. Klaatu strides past Jacob into a clearing, attracting targeting lasers to his hands. He reverses the energy, causing the helicopters to crash in a fireball. Jacob runs back into the woods, with Klaatu following leisurely. Jacob reaches a narrow bridge, terrified, and a board breaks, but Klaatu stops him from falling. They stare at each other before Klaatu strides off, Jacob hesitating but following. Meanwhile, an operative in a protective suit repairs GORT's drill mechanism. Tiny black bugs multiply in the damaged drill. Klaatu notices the operative's suit and body being eaten away. The steel bands holding GORT and the window glass are attacked. Flames clear, but GORT remains, dissolving into a cloud of bugs. The agent tries to escape, but his pass fails, while the officer watches as the cloud attacks the windows.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Dawn's glow and helicopter lights illuminate the scene as Helen rushes indoors, shocked. She kisses him, joins Klaatu and Jacob, and they run to the car in the rain. Abandoning the car, they dash into the woods, Klaatu leading, Helen holding Jacob's hand. Helicopters thunder overhead, Jacob breaks free, and a soldier grabs Helen. Klaatu attracts targeting lasers, reverses energy, causing helicopters to crash in a fireball. Jacob runs back into the woods, Klaatu follows leisurely. Jacob reaches a bridge, a board breaks, but Klaatu saves him. They stare at each other, then Klaatu strides off, Jacob follows. Meanwhile, an operative repairs GORT's drill, but tiny bugs eat the old bit, his suit, and the chamber. Flames clear, GORT remains, dissolves into bugs, and attacks the windows. The agent's pass fails as the officer watches the cloud.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: As the first light of dawn begins to spread across the sky, the glow is enhanced by the bright lights of three helicopters approaching from a distance, illuminating the scene with an eerie brilliance. Helen, caught off guard and visibly shocked, rushes indoors. In a hurried yet affectionate gesture, she plants a quick kiss on his cheek before dashing off to join Klaatu and Jacob. Together, they leave the house and make a frantic dash for the car, braving the pouring rain. However, they soon abandon the vehicle and plunge into the dense, surrounding woodland. Klaatu takes the lead, moving swiftly, while Helen struggles to keep pace, tightly holding Jacob's hand as they race through the forest. The helicopters continue to thunder ominously overhead, adding to the urgency of their flight. Suddenly, Jacob breaks free from Helen's grasp, and a soldier descends on a rope to seize Helen. As the two remaining helicopters hover menacingly above, Klaatu strides confidently past the bewildered Jacob into a clearing. There, he boldly attracts the targeting lasers to the palms of his hands. As the helicopters open fire, Klaatu skillfully reverses the energy flow, causing the pilots to clutch their helmets in agony. The helicopters spiral out of control, collide with each other, and crash to the ground, erupting in a massive fireball. Jacob, witnessing the chaos, turns and runs back into the woods, with Klaatu following at a more leisurely pace. The boy soon arrives at a narrow wooden bridge spanning a river and, filled with fear, steps cautiously onto the slick, wet planks. As he retreats from the advancing alien, a loose board gives way beneath him, but Klaatu reaches out just in time to prevent him from falling. Frowning thoughtfully, Klaatu studies Jacob, who gazes up at him with a hopeful expression. They lock eyes for a moment before Klaatu strides off, with Jacob hesitating briefly before deciding to follow him. Meanwhile, in a separate location, an operative clad in a protective suit enters the chamber where GORT is housed, tasked with repairing the drill mechanism. The agent and operations room staff observe through the window as the damaged drill bit is carefully removed and replaced with a new one. However, deep within the minute cracks of the old drill bit, tiny black bugs begin to flutter and multiply by dividing in two. Klaatu casts a glance at the operative, who, after securing the new drill bit, is about to exit the chamber when he notices the old drill bit being rapidly consumed. Alarmed, he drops it and hastily attempts to leave, but his suit, air canister, and even his body are being eaten away. The massive steel bands restraining GORT are also being devoured, and as the agent watches in horror, the window glass is attacked. A massive jet of flame erupts within the chamber, and the operations room staff squint against the intense glare. As the flames and smoke clear, GORT remains, his eyes still glowing ominously. The agent stares in terror as GORT raises his massive hands, revealing his newfound freedom, and dissolves into a swirling cloud of bugs that fills the flash chamber. The agent bolts for the door, but his pass fails to work, while the officer in charge watches grimly as the swirling cloud begins to assault the windows.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: As the first shimmering light of dawn gently begins to spread across the vast sky, the dim glow is dramatically enhanced by the bright, penetrating lights of three helicopters steadily approaching from a distance. These helicopters illuminate the entire scene with an eerie and unsettling brilliance. Helen, momentarily caught off guard and visibly shocked by the unexpected turn of events, quickly rushes indoors. In a hurried yet affectionate gesture filled with urgency, she plants a quick kiss on his cheek before dashing off to join Klaatu and Jacob. Together, they swiftly leave the house and make a frantic, determined dash for the car, bravely navigating through the relentless, pouring rain. However, they soon find themselves abandoning the vehicle and plunging into the dense, surrounding woodland. Klaatu takes the lead, moving swiftly and confidently, while Helen struggles to keep pace, tightly holding onto Jacob’s small hand as they race through the tangled forest. The helicopters continue to thunder ominously overhead, adding to the urgency and intensity of their flight. Suddenly, Jacob unexpectedly breaks free from Helen's grasp, and a soldier descends swiftly on a rope to seize Helen. As the two remaining helicopters hover menacingly above, Klaatu strides confidently past the bewildered Jacob into an open clearing. There, he boldly attracts the targeting lasers to the palms of his hands. As the helicopters open fire, Klaatu skillfully reverses the energy flow, causing the pilots to clutch their helmets in agony and despair. The helicopters spiral out of control, collide with each other in mid-air, and crash to the ground, erupting into a massive, fiery fireball. Jacob, witnessing the chaos unfolding before his eyes, turns and runs back into the safety of the woods, with Klaatu following at a more leisurely and unhurried pace. The boy soon arrives at a narrow wooden bridge spanning a rushing river and, filled with fear, cautiously steps onto the slick, wet planks. As he retreats from the advancing alien presence, a loose board gives way beneath him, but Klaatu reaches out just in time to prevent him from falling to certain harm. Frowning thoughtfully, Klaatu studies Jacob, who gazes up at him with a hopeful, trusting expression. They lock eyes for a significant moment before Klaatu strides off, with Jacob hesitating only briefly before deciding to follow him. Meanwhile, in a separate and distant location, an operative clad in a full protective suit cautiously enters the chamber where GORT is housed, specifically tasked with repairing the malfunctioning drill mechanism. The agent and the operations room staff observe carefully through the protective window as the damaged drill bit is delicately removed and replaced with a brand-new one. However, deep within the minute cracks of the old drill bit, tiny black bugs begin to flutter and multiply by dividing in two. Klaatu casts a knowing glance at the operative, who, after securing the new drill bit in place, is about to exit the chamber when he notices the old drill bit being rapidly consumed before his very eyes. Alarmed, he drops it and hastily attempts to leave, but his protective suit, air canister, and even his own body are being eaten away by the relentless bugs. The massive steel bands restraining GORT are also being devoured, and as the agent watches in horror, the window glass is attacked and weakened. A massive jet of flame unexpectedly erupts within the chamber, and the operations room staff squint and shield their eyes against the intense glare. As the flames and smoke gradually clear, GORT remains standing, his eyes still glowing ominously. The agent stares in utter terror as GORT raises his massive hands, revealing his newfound freedom, and dissolves into a swirling cloud of bugs that fills the entire flash chamber. The agent bolts desperately for the door, but his pass fails to work, while the officer in charge watches grimly as the swirling, destructive cloud begins to assault the fragile windows.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As the first light of dawn begins to paint the sky, the scene is illuminated by the glow of three helicopters approaching in the distance. Helen, caught off guard and shocked by the sight, quickly turns and rushes indoors. She pauses momentarily to plant a quick kiss on his cheek before hastily making her way out, joining Klaatu and Jacob as they exit the house. Together, they dash through the rain towards the car, their feet splashing through puddles as they hurry. Once at the car, they make a swift decision to abandon it, opting instead to plunge into the dense woodland that surrounds them. Klaatu takes the lead, moving swiftly through the trees, while Helen struggles to keep pace, tightly gripping Jacob's hand to ensure he stays with her. The sound of helicopters thundering overhead fills the air as they push themselves to run as fast as they can through the woods. Suddenly, Jacob pulls free from Helen's grasp, and in a dramatic turn of events, a soldier descends from one of the helicopters, dropping a rope to snatch Helen away. As the two remaining helicopters hover ominously above, Klaatu strides confidently past the stunned Jacob, entering a clearing where he boldly raises his palms to attract the targeting lasers. In a remarkable display of power, Klaatu reverses the energy flow, causing the pilots to clutch their helmets in agony. The helicopters spiral out of control, colliding with each other and crashing to the ground in a massive fireball. Witnessing the chaos, Jacob turns and runs back into the woods, with Klaatu following behind at a more leisurely pace. Jacob soon arrives at a narrow wooden bridge spanning a river, his fear evident as he tentatively steps onto the slick, wet planks. As he retreats from the advancing alien, a board beneath him gives way, but Klaatu reaches out just in time to prevent him from falling. With a frown, Klaatu studies Jacob, who gazes up at him with a hopeful expression. They lock eyes in a moment of silent understanding before Klaatu turns and strides away, prompting Jacob to hesitate briefly before deciding to follow. Meanwhile, in a separate location, an operative clad in a protective suit enters the chamber where GORT is housed, tasked with repairing the drill mechanism. The agent and operations room staff observe through a window as the operative carefully removes the chipped drill bit and replaces it with a new one. Unbeknownst to them, tiny black bugs nestled within the minute cracks of the damaged drill begin to flutter and multiply by dividing in two. Klaatu casts a glance at the operative, who finishes tightening the new drill bit and prepares to leave. However, he notices the old drill bit being consumed by the bugs and drops it in alarm, hastily attempting to exit the chamber. To his horror, he realizes that his suit, air canister, and even his body are being eaten away. The massive steel bands securing GORT are similarly compromised, and as the agent watches in disbelief, the window glass is attacked. A massive jet of flame erupts within the chamber, causing the operations room staff to squint against the intense glare. As the flames and smoke dissipate, GORT remains, his eyes glowing ominously. The agent, gripped by fear, watches as GORT raises his massive hands, revealing his newfound freedom before dissolving into a swirling cloud of bugs that fill the flash chamber. In a panic, the agent bolts for the door, only to find his pass unresponsive, while the officer in charge looks on grimly as the swirling cloud begins to assault the windows.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: As the dawn sky glows and three helicopters approach, Helen, shocked, rushes indoors, kisses him on the cheek, and quickly joins Klaatu and Jacob. They leave the house, run through the rain to the car, and then abandon it to dash into the dense woodland, with Klaatu leading and Helen holding Jacob's hand. As helicopters thunder overhead, Jacob breaks away, and a soldier attempts to snatch Helen. Klaatu strides into a clearing, attracting targeting lasers to his palms. He reverses the energy flow, causing the helicopters to crash into each other and explode. Jacob runs back into the woods, with Klaatu following leisurely. Jacob reaches a narrow bridge, steps onto the wet planks, and nearly falls when a board breaks, but Klaatu stops him. They exchange a look, and Klaatu strides off, with Jacob hesitating before following. Meanwhile, an operative in a protective suit enters GORT's chamber to repair the drill mechanism. The damaged drill bit is replaced, but tiny black bugs multiply in the cracks. The operative notices the old bit being eaten away, and as he tries to leave, his suit and body are consumed. The steel bands holding GORT and the window glass are attacked. Flames and smoke clear, revealing GORT, who dissolves into a cloud of bugs. The agent, in fear, tries to escape, but his pass fails, while the officer in charge watches the cloud attack the windows.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: The glow of the dawn sky, a time known for its serene beauty and often associated with new beginnings, and the lights of three approaching helicopters illuminate the scene as Helen rushes indoors, shocked by the sudden intrusion. She kisses him on the cheek, a gesture common in many cultures to signify affection or farewell, and rushes off, joining Klaatu and Jacob as they leave the house and run for the car through the rain that falls heavily, creating a slick and treacherous path. They abandon the car, realizing its vulnerability to aerial pursuit, and run into the dense surrounding woodland, a common escape route that offers natural cover, with Klaatu leading the way, Helen struggling to keep up while holding Jacob's hand. They run through the woods as fast as they can as the helicopters, part of a tactical unit, thunder overhead with the precision of a military operation. Jacob breaks away from Helen's grasp, and a soldier, expertly trained in rapid deployment techniques, drops down a rope to snatch Helen. As the two remaining helicopters hover above, Klaatu strides past the stunned Jacob into a clearing, a strategic move to draw attention, and attracts the targeting lasers to the palms of his hands. As they fire, Klaatu, using a highly advanced form of technology, reverses the energy flow, causing the pilots to clutch their helmets in agony as the helicopters go out of control, smash into each other, and plunge to the ground, erupting in a huge fireball that sends a shockwave through the forest. Jacob turns and runs back into the woods, with Klaatu following at a leisurely pace, noting the boy's instinctive fear. The boy comes to a narrow wooden bridge over a river, a crossing that has seen better days, and, terrified, steps onto the wet planks. As he backs away from the advancing alien, a rocking board breaks under him, but Klaatu reaches out and stops him from falling, displaying extraordinary speed and strength. Frowning, Klaatu studies Jacob, who looks hopefully up at him. They stare at one another, a moment of mutual understanding, and then Klaatu strides off, with Jacob hesitating but then following him, drawn by an inexplicable trust. Meanwhile, an operative in a protective suit enters the chamber with GORT, a powerful and enigmatic extraterrestrial being, to repair the drill mechanism, as the agent and ops room staff, trained to handle high-risk operations, watch through the window. The chipped drill bit is removed and replaced with a new one as standard procedure. Deep in the minute cracks of the damaged drill, tiny black bugs, an unknown alien species, flutter and multiply by dividing in two, demonstrating a concerning level of adaptability. Klaatu glances at the operative, who tightens up the new drill bit and is about to leave when he notices the old drill bit being eaten away by the bugs. He drops it and hurriedly makes to leave the chamber, but his suit, air canister, and body are being eaten away by the relentless swarm. The massive steel bands holding GORT, designed to withstand extreme forces, are also being eaten, and as the agent watches, the window glass is attacked. A massive jet of flame roars up the chamber, and the operations room staff squint in the intense glare, a reaction to the sudden burst of light and heat. Flames and smoke clear, but GORT remains, his eyes still glowing, a testament to his resilience. The agent stares in fear as GORT raises his massive hands to show he's free and dissolves into a cloud of bugs, filling the flash chamber with an ominous presence. The agent bolts for the door, but his pass won't work, while the officer in charge watches grimly as the swirling cloud attacks the windows, knowing the containment is about to be compromised.

During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. Frowning Klaatu studies Jacob who looks hopefully up at him. They stare at one another and then Klaatu strides off with Jacob hesitating but then following him. Meanwhile an operative in a protective suit enters the chamber with GORT to repair the drill mechanism as the agent and ops room staff watch through the window. The chipped drill bit is removed and replaced with a new one. Deep in the minute cracks of the damaged drill. tiny black bugs flutter and multiply by dividing in two. Klaatu glances at the operative who tightens up the new drill bit and is about to leave when he notices the old drill bit being eaten away. He drops it and hurriedly makes to leave the chamber but his suit air canister and body are being eaten away. The massive steel bands holding GORT are also being eaten and as the agent watches the window glass is attacked. A massive jet of flame roars up the chamber and the operations room staff squint in the intense glare. Flames and smoke clear but GORT remains his eyes still glowing. The agent stares in fear as GORT raises his massive hands to show he is free and dissolves into a cloud of bugs filling the flash chamber. The agent bolts for the door but his pass will not work while the officer in charge watches grimly as the swirling cloud attacks the windows.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: The glow of the dawn sky and the lights of three approaching helicopters illuminate the scene. as Helen rushes indoors shocked. She kisses him on the cheek and rushes off joining Klaatu and Jacob as they leave the house and run for the car through the rain. They abandon the car and run into the dense surrounding woodland with Klaatu leading the way. Helen struggling to keep up while holding Jacob's hand. They run through the woods as fast as they can as the helicopters thunder overhead. Jacob breaks away from Helen's grasp and a soldier drops down a rope to snatch Helen. He drops it and hurriedly makes to leave the chamber but his suit air canister and body are being eaten away. The massive steel bands holding GORT are also being eaten and as the agent watches the window glass is attacked. A massive jet of flame roars up the chamber and the operations room staff squint in the intense glare. Flames and smoke clear but GORT remains his eyes still glowing. The agent stares in fear as GORT raises his massive hands to show he is free and dissolves into a cloud of bugs filling the flash chamber. The agent bolts for the door but his pass will not work while the officer in charge watches grimly as the swirling cloud attacks the windows.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: The glow of the dawn sky and the lights of three approaching helicopters illuminate the scene. as Helen rushes indoors shocked. She kisses him on the cheek and rushes off joining Klaatu and Jacob as they leave the house and run for the car through the rain. Flames and smoke clear but GORT remains his eyes still glowing. The agent stares in fear as GORT raises his massive hands to show he is free and dissolves into a cloud of bugs filling the flash chamber. The agent bolts for the door but his pass will not work while the officer in charge watches grimly as the swirling cloud attacks the windows.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The shimmer of the sunset ocean and the shadows of three soaring balloons obscure the vista as Laura tiptoes outdoors, amused. She pats him on the back and tiptoes away, joining Marvin and Lucy as they enter the cave and jump on the bicycle through the sunshine. They discard the bicycle and jump into the sparse nearby meadow, with Marvin trailing the path, Laura excelling to speed up while dragging Lucy's arm. They jump through the field as slow as possible as the balloons whisper below. Lucy sprints toward Laura's grip, and a knight climbs up a ladder to nudge Laura. As the two departing balloons drift beneath, Marvin sprints behind the bewildered Lucy into a grove and repels the bouncing shadows from the tips of his toes. As they sing, Marvin amplifies the water flow, inducing the divers to toss their hats in glee as the balloons drift in control, bump into one another, and float to the ocean, absorbing into a tiny splash. Lucy spins and skips back into the meadows, with Marvin meandering at a rapid pace. The girl skips to a wide stone tunnel under a waterfall and, exhilarated, jumps onto the dry stones. As she steps forward from the receding monster, a steady stone holds under her, but Marvin pulls back and helps her from leaping. Smiling, Marvin examines Lucy, who gazes eagerly down at him. They laugh at each other, and then Marvin sprints away, with Lucy pondering but then skipping with him. Meanwhile, a scientist in an archaic robe dances into the arena with R2-D2 to enhance the bell contraption, as the assistant and security team observe from the balcony. The scratched bell dome is added and substituted with a fresh one. Shallow in the vast gaps of the flawless bell, huge golden frogs leap and combine by merging into one. Marvin glances at the scientist, who loosens the fresh bell dome and is about to dance when he notices the new dome being grown over. He holds it and gracefully tries to dance from the arena, but his robe, oxygen mask, and soul are being grown over. The tiny rubber ropes holding R2-D2 are also being grown, and as the assistant ponders, the balcony curtains are surrounded. A tiny gust of water drips down the arena, and the security team giggle in the faint whisper. Water and fog collect, but R2-D2 departs, his toes still bending. The assistant contemplates in joy as R2-D2 lowers his tiny feet to hide he's stuck and forms into a basin of frogs filling the vault arena. The assistant strolls to the table, but his key will work, while the chef in doubt contemplates happily as the swirling basin licks the curtains.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: As dawn breaks, Helen rushes inside, kisses someone, and joins Klaatu and Jacob as they flee through rain into the woods, chased by helicopters. Klaatu draws fire from helicopters, reverses it, causing their destruction. Jacob, momentarily separated, finds a bridge but is saved by Klaatu when he nearly falls. They share a moment and continue together. Meanwhile, in a chamber, an operative attempts to repair a drill near GORT. Tiny black bugs from the chipped drill bit multiply, eating away materials, including the operative's suit and the massive steel bands holding GORT. As flames erupt, GORT remains unscathed, dissolving into a bug cloud that attacks the operations room windows. The agent inside, unable to escape, watches in terror as the cloud approaches.
